verses.roman:
tumi yāi' kara tāhāṅ sarva samādhāna
dravya yaiche āise, āra rahe tāra prāṇa"

synonyms: tumi—you; yāi'-going; kara—make; tāhāṅ—there; sarva samādhāna—all adjustments; dravya—goods; yaiche—so that; āise—come; āra—and; rahe—keeps; tāra—his; prāṇa—life.
translation: "Go there and adjust everything. I want only the payment, not his life."
